articles.title: Lorraine Kelly forced off ITV show as she's replaced by Carol Vorderman - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Former Countdown star Carol will be hosting Lorraine on ITV as the show's usual host explained her absence
articles.content:
Lorraine Kelly has been forced off her self-titled ITV programme for a few days and replaced by Carol Vorderman. The Scottish TV star was last seen hosting her Lorraine show on Friday (July 8).
